page.title: 06Ghosts in West Ashby.
page.content: The Grove was originally the home of the Elmhirst's. The family motto, above the door, is Domino Confido - Trust in the Lord.Several ghosts have been discovered at the Grove, now an hotel. One ghost on the top floor is said to be friendly and give a warm feeling.One ghost in a first floor bathroom left a lady paralysed with fear.One ghost opens and closes doors in the utility room and first floor shower room.This last ghost,named Nellie,is described as being in her 20's, wearing a long black dress,white bib and apron and is perhaps a 19th century maid.She moves things around in the kitchen.Some claim to have seen a tall thin man in the Dining Room in a grey double breasted suit.He is thought to be Squire Elmhirst himself.
